body:
Hello @eric-wieser! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/tests/test_algos.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/3444dc219c75461fec6b69381576de46892aaaf5/pandas/tests/test_algos.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 392:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/3444dc219c75461fec6b69381576de46892aaaf5/pandas/tests/test_algos.py#L392): [E741](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E741) ambiguous variable name 'l'

Hey @pep8speaks, I didn't even touch that line.

(I know you're a bot)

> (I know you're a bot)

they never listen :>

@eric-wieser thanks for fixing

also https://github.com/numpy/numpy/issues/641 is relevant on the numpy side (this is what safe_sort is fixing in fact)
